title: Enhancing Programming Practical Competencies: Computer Literacy Education in Science for Digital Immigrants

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners acquire basic computer operation skills (file management, internet search, document editing) as assessed by evaluation criteria.

Learners will visualize ≥3 types of scientific data (e.g., experimental results, observational data) using chart/graph tools (bar, line, scatter plots) in Excel or Google Sheets. They will draft a 5-page report based on these visualizations.

Learners will plan and track learning activities ≥3 times weekly on an LMS (e.g., Google Classroom, Moodle) for one month. They will demonstrate self-directed learning management by achieving ≥80% progress and scoring ≥70 points on platform assessments (quizzes/assignments).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
